description.narrative: As one of UNIDO#s primary instruments for advancing policy dialogue, building institutional capacities and creating global communities of practice in the field of industrial development, UNIDO with financial support from the German Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ) designed and developed a data-driven platform during Phase I (2017-2019) of the subject project, and developed the SDG-9 Industry Tracker, the Quarterly Tracker, the Revealed Comparative Advantage Tool (RCA) and established a formal publishing process during Phase II (2020-2021), funded through the Gesellschaft fuer International Zusammenarbeit (GIZ). The UNIDO Industrial Analytics Platform (IAP) provides intelligence and analysis on the state of industrial development around the world and can be used to provide capacity building services in the context of specific country/regional needs and policies, reaching thousands of users online every month via the site and its associated communication channels.
